Description.Text:
Position The hotel is situated in the enchanting bay of Sas Linnas Siccas in the Gulf of Orosei.
Restaurant The two rooms restaurant / pizzeria offer an accurate service rich in national and local dishes and excellent hospitality.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations The complex offers the following services: reception hall, TV room, restaurant-pizzeria, tobacconist, newspaper and souvenir shop, supermarket, laundry, private parking, swimming pool equipped with umbrellas and deck chairs, table tennis, billiards, snooker, bowling green, tennis court, soccer field, playground for children.
CLUB CARD is compulsory to pay directly on spot. The card includes: beach service, pool, entertainment.
Check in: from 05.00 p.m.
